channel.title: I have serv but how i get with no-ip adress?
channel.description: How do I activate my NO-IP DUC for my server (LinkScape V.1) and put it on my server to make it so when I log in I can log in on a NO-IP?

item.title: I have serv but how i get with no-ip adress?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. make an account on no-ip.org and log in
  2. in the left column under hosts/redirects click add
  3. put in your hostname (name you want your server to be called) choose a suffix for it (no-ip.org, no-ip.biz, no-ip.info) leave your ip address there
  4. donâ€™t enter anything or change anything other than what i said up there and click create host
  5. login to your no-ip duc and click the little check box there

Read full topic
item.source: I have serv but how i get with no-ip adress?
